channel.title: PI item requirement Help 317

item.title: PI item requirement Help 317
item.dc:creator: @deadlygfx deadlygfx
item.description:
@deadlygfx wrote:

Hey, sorry for gravedigging but I like the thread creator… I have tried everything…

I have added all the LevelReq in Player.java(smithingLevelReq, farmingLevelReq, etc).
I have added all the methods for all the skillcapes I want to use to itemassistant.java under
“if(Config.itemRequirements) {”:

if(targetSlot == 1) {
						if(c.attackLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) < c.attackLevelReq) {
									c.sendMessage("You need a attack level of "+c.attackLevelReq+" to wear this item.");
									canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.defenceLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) < c.defenceLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a defence level of "+c.defenceLevelReq+" to wear this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.strengthLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) < c.strengthLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a strength level of "+c.strengthLevelReq+" to wear this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.hitpointsLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) < c.hitpointsLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a hitpoints level of "+c.hitpointsLevelReq+" to wear this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.rangeLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) < c.rangeLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a range level of "+c.rangeLevelReq+" to wear this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.magicLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) < c.magicLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a magic level of "+c.magicLevelReq+" to wear this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.prayerLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) < c.prayerLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a prayer level of "+c.prayerLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.cookingLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7]) < c.cookingLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a cooking level of "+c.cookingLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.woodcuttingLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8]) < c.woodcuttingLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a woodcutting level of "+c.woodcuttingLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.fletchingLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[9]) < c.fletchingLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a fletching level of "+c.fletchingLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.fishingLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]) < c.fishingLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a fishing level of "+c.fishingLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.firemakingLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11]) < c.firemakingLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a firemaking level of "+c.firemakingLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.craftingLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12]) < c.craftingLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a crafting level of "+c.craftingLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.smithingLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[13]) < c.smithingLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a smithing level of "+c.smithingLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.miningLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14]) < c.miningLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a mining level of "+c.miningLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.herbloreLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[15]) < c.herbloreLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a herblore level of "+c.herbloreLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.agilityLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[16]) < c.agilityLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a agility level of "+c.agilityLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.thievingLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[17]) < c.thievingLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a thieving level of "+c.thievingLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.slayerLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[18]) < c.slayerLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a slayer level of "+c.slayerLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.farmingLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[19]) < c.farmingLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a farming level of "+c.farmingLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
						if(c.runecraftingLevelReq > 0) {
							if(c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[20]) < c.runecraftingLevelReq) {
								c.sendMessage("You need a runecrafting level of "+c.runecraftingLevelReq+" to wield this item.");
								canWearItem = false;
							}
						}
					}

and the I have tested with 3 capes under
“public void getRequirements(String itemName, int itemId) {”:

[code]
if (itemName.contains(“attack cape”) || itemName.contains(“attack hood”)) {
c.attackLevelReq = 99;
}

	if (itemName.contains("farming cape") || itemName.contains("farming hood")) {
		c.farmingLevelReq = 99;
	}
	if (itemName.contains("runecrafting cape") || itemName.contains("runecrafting hood")) {
		c.runecraftingLevelReq = 99;
	}

[/code].

It compiles & runs fine but when you try to wear a different cape like Runecrafting Cape(t) or even a cape that you have 99 in, it says:

and I have noo idea why this is happening :S

can someone please help me.

Read full topic

                    if(itemName.contains("cape")) {

item.title: PI item requirement Help 317
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

hey i have a problem setting level requirements for SKILL CAPES
ive searched tutorials on many sites, including here… i couldnt find any that worked. every time i do what it says all it does is
let me wield it, im trying to test one skill at a time, in this case i was testing Attack. Whenever i wielded the attack cape, it just automaticaly wielded, and i had everything set up. ik it has smoethnig to do with Itemassisnt.java Heres what i Have. [code=scala]if(itemName.contains(“cape(t)”)) {

		if(itemName.contains("Attack")) {
			c.attackLevelReq = 99;
		}
}		[/code]

Then if you scroll down a little bit theres hthis

switch(itemId) { case 9748: // Skill cape ID c.attackLevelReq = 99; //99 Attack Requirement for attack cape return;
P.S this is for the original PI made by Sanity

Read full topic
